Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Red Lash pirates under Abraxis's command are plundering and hunting slaves on Mistmoor Island.

Destroy {@LinkCreature:12#19#Abraxis} to send a warning to the pirates.

Report to the nearest guild quest coordinator for your reward when you have completed the quest.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
